title: A water carrier (Saqqa) in the courtyard of an Arab house
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Photographer's description: 2029 Cour de Maison Arabe. Translation of photographer's description: 2029 Courtyard of an Arab house. Collector's note: Arusi house?  - Cairo domestic architecture.
architectural-detail: benches (furniture); chain moldings; chairs (furniture forms); columns (architectural elements); doors; lintels
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
source: From: A water carrier (Saqqa) in the courtyard of an Arab house
